subject: Federal Ministry of Finance,
body:
Federal Ministry of Finance, Headquarters,
                                        Ahmadu Bello Way,
                                    Central Business District,
                                        P.M.Box 41,Garki,
                                        Abuja, Nigeria
ATTN;
Dear Beneficiary.
I write to ascertain why you are yet to respond to my last email base
on the Directive's from the Central Bank Of Nigeria Governor. I want
to notify you that your overdue contract/inheritance payment has been
irrevocably and unconditionally ready to be released to you. And base
on the Directives by President Federal Republic Of Nigeria Bola Ahmed
Tinubu GCFR Commander In Chief Federal Republic Of Nigeria, you will
be required to complete all necessary formalities to get your overdue
contract/inheritance payment irrevocably wired to any of your
nominated bank account. In view of this new development, you are asked
to immediately revert back to me for further directives.
You are advised to keep this new development to your good self alone
until you confirm your payment in your account. Thanks for your
cooperation. We are sorry for the late payment.
Re Confirming of your full details below
Full Name:
Address:
Age:
Occupation:
International Passport
Phone Number:
Next of Kin's:
Contact my office through this email (
financeministry421@gmail.com
)
Yours Faithfully,
Nigeria Ministry of Finance Office
Minister Chief Adebayo Olawale Edun
Compensation Office

subject: Re:   Federal Ministry of Finance,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details of this contract payment you're referring to. Could you please provide more information about it? 

Also, could you clarify what necessary steps I need to take in order to have this payment wired to my bank account? 

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Terry
